title: Scenario list
description: A list of all the data required to recreate all scenarios in Agemonia Combat Helper

Data.description: Array to be parsed into Scenario object instances by the JSON Deserializer

Enemies.description: An array of the enemies present in the scenario

ActionColor.description: The action color that the enemy acts during

HPBase.description: The flat value added to an enemy's HP

HPMultiplier.description: The amount of HP added to an enemy per player

RetaliateAmount.description: The amount of damage a player will suffer upon exiting the range of influence of this enemy

RetaliateRange.description: The amount of tiles of range of retaliation the enemy has

Tags.description: The enemy type tags this enemy possesses

Armor.description: The amount of damage that will be reduced from all attacks this enemy receives

SnakeModifier.description: The action this enemy will perform if its corresponding action color on the initiative for this card is associated with the snake modifier

Name.description: The name of the modifier attack

Text.description: The content of the modifier attack

Drops.description: What the enemy will drop when defeated

Attacks.description: The various attacks the enemy will perform depending on which attack symbol was drawn for this turn

AttackSymbol.description: The attack symbol this attack is associated with

Movement.description: The amount of tiles this enemy will move before performing this attack

HornModifier.description: The action this enemy will perform after the attack if the horn modifier was drawn this turn

Name.description: The name of the modifier attack

Text.description: The content of the modifier attack
